description: Meditations on the Teachings of Jesus — An invitation to discover the heart of the Gospel.

content: There is a story that has transformed millions of lives throughout the centuries. It is the story of a love that knows no limits, of a grace that reaches everyone, of a way that leads to true life. Perhaps you already know it. Perhaps, in reading these words, you are remembering something you always carried within.
